name: 1337x.to - simple dark
description: Since I couldn't find any available themes for 1337x.to, thought I would make a quick theme that turns the site to a night mode. It's simple but it works.

user.name: Computerguy
user.about:
I am a technology enthusiast. I believe in going beyond and exceeding the limits of the boundaries of the experiences for websites. It it can be improved, performance or graphics, I believe people have that right to experience it. If you don't prefer my themes at the end, I hope inspiration has. Depending on the theme, such as Google or YouTube, some themes may become outdated and replaced entirely due to the constant evolution of some sites, but they will remain for public use.
